title: H. M. M. Harees
text:
Habeeb Mohamed Mohamed Harees (ஹபீப் முஹம்மட் முஹம்மட் ஹரீஸ்) is a <a href="Sri%20Lanka">Sri Lanka</a>n <a href="politician">politician</a> and <a href="Member%20of%20Parliament">Member of Parliament</a>.
Harees represented the <a href="Ampara%20Electoral%20District">Ampara</a> <a href="multi-member">multi-member</a> <a href="Electoral%20districts%20in%20Sri%20Lanka">electoral district</a> for the <a href="Sri%20Lanka%20Muslim%20Congress">Sri Lanka Muslim Congress</a> in the <a href="Sri%20Lankan%20Parliament">Sri Lankan Parliament</a> between <a href="2001%20Sri%20Lankan%20parliamentary%20election">December 2001</a> and April 2004.
Harees returned to Parliament in <a href="2010%20Sri%20Lankan%20parliamentary%20election">April 2010</a>, this time representing <a href="Ampara%20Electoral%20District">Ampara</a> for the <a href="United%20National%20Front%20%28Sri%20Lanka%29">United National Front</a>.
